ygData.subject: dex and cha items?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, I m new to the list and running a 13th lvl half elf bard.   I m camping Dervs in W.C. right now but want to start hunting for dex and charisma
ygData.messageBody:
Hi everyone,

I'm new to the list and running a 13th lvl half elf
bard. I'm camping Dervs in W.C. right now but want
to start hunting for dex and charisma items.

What mobs can I hunt that will drop this stuff? I
realize I'm not going to be picking up platinum ruby
veils at this point...just need some places to start.

Living the Song

Tyunes of Kelethin
Rodcet Nife
